MI.name: Сводный отчет о назначении и выплате пособий
Сводный отчет о назначении и выплате пособий(регионы)

A.name: Получатель пособия
A.caption: Получатель пособия
A.formula: select trim(COALESCE(lastname,'')||' '||COALESCE(firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(patronymic,'')) from benefitsrecipients b where b.id=@BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID::bigint

A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select coalesce(regexp_replace(max(lpad(docnumb,80,' ')), '[^0-9]', '', 'g')::int+1,1) from @TABLENAME where doctypeid=@DOCTYPEID and cid=0

A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select coalesce(regexp_replace(max(lpad(docnumb,80,' ')), '[^0-9]', '', 'g')::int+1,1) from @TABLENAME where doctypeid=@DOCTYPEID and docpref = @DOCPREF and cid=0

A.name: Имя файла
A.caption: Имя файла
A.formula: select f.filename from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID

A.name: Размер файла
A.caption: Размер файла
A.formula: select f.size from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID

A.name: Дата загрузки файла
A.caption: Дата загрузки файла
A.formula: select f.docdate from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID

A.name: Настройки фильтра
A.formula: case when @FILTER = 'false' then null else (select b.filterinfo from configcolumnsbuff b where b.id = @ID) end

A.name: Год
A.caption: Год
A.formula: select case (to_char( now() - interval '1 month','MM')) when '01' then to_char( now()- interval '1 year','YYYY') else to_char(now(),'YYYY') end

A.name: Месяц
A.caption: Месяц
A.formula: select (to_char(now()- interval '1 month','MM'))::int

A.name: Год
A.caption: Год
A.formula: select b.repyear from benefitspackets b where b.id=@BENEFITSPACKETSID ::bigint

A.name: Месяц
A.caption: Месяц
A.formula: select b.repmonth from benefitspackets b where b.id=@BENEFITSPACKETSID ::bigint

A.name: Вид
A.caption: Вид
A.formula: select PERSONDOCUMENTTYPEID from BENEFITSRECIPIENTS where id=@BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID

A.name: Cерия
A.caption: Cерия
A.formula: select PERSONDOCUMENTSERIES from BENEFITSRECIPIENTS where id=@BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID

A.name: Номер
A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select PERSONDOCUMENTNUMBER from BENEFITSRECIPIENTS where id=@BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID

A.name: Дата выдачи
A.caption: Дата выдачи
A.formula: select PERSONDOCUMENTDATE from BENEFITSRECIPIENTS where id=@BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID

A.name: Регион
A.caption: Регион
A.formula: select d.name from companydir b, subjectsdir d where b.subjectsdirid = d.id and b.id= @COMPANYNAMEID ::bigint

A.name: Регион
A.caption: Регион
A.formula: select d.name from benefitspackets b, subjectsdir d where b.subjectsdirid=d.id and b.id=@BENEFITSPACKETSID ::bigint

A.name: Фамилия
A.caption: Фамилия
A.formula: select b.lastname from benefitsrecipients b where b.id=@BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID ::bigint

A.name: Имя
A.caption: Имя
A.formula: select b.firstname from benefitsrecipients b where b.id=@BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID ::bigint

A.name: Отчество
A.caption: Отчество
A.formula: select b.patronymic from benefitsrecipients b where b.id=@BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID ::bigint

A.name: Примечание
A.caption: Примечание
A.formula: select r.note from remark r where r.id=@REMARKID ::bigint

A.name: Вид
A.caption: Вид
A.formula: select d.name from benefitchild b, CERTIFICATEBIRTHDIR d where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID ::bigint and b.docbirthchildtypeid=d.id

A.name: Серия
A.caption: Серия
A.formula: select b.docbirthchildserial from benefitchild b where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID ::bigint

A.name: Номер
A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select b.docbirthchildnumber from benefitchild b where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID ::bigint

A.name: Дата выдачи
A.caption: Дата выдачи
A.formula: select b.docbirthchilddate from benefitchild b where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID ::bigint

A.name: Тип
A.caption: Тип
A.formula: select u.classnode from units u where u.id = @UNITID

AI.name: Текстовый файл с полями фиксированной длины

A.formula: select coalesce(max(position)+1,1) from conceptitems where conceptid=@CONCEPTID and hid is null and @HID is null or hid=@HID and cid=0

A.name: Тип элемента
A.caption: Тип элемента
A.formula: P_SYSTEM_CONCEPTITEMS_GET_TYPE(@CONCEPTID, @HID, @ATTR)
select conceptid from conv where id=@CONVID

A.name: Порядок
A.caption: Порядок
A.formula: select coalesce(max(position)+1,1) from convacts where convid=@CONVID and hid is null and @HID is null or hid=@HID and cid=0

A.name: Таблица формата
A.caption: Таблица формата
A.formula: select min(ci.id) from conv c, conceptitems ci where c.id=@CONVID and c.conceptid = ci.conceptid and ci.cid=0

A.name: Наименование
A.caption: Наименование
A.query: select upper(tablename) as id, (select coalesce(upper(tablename)||' - '||max(m.name),upper(tablename)) from metaclass m where m.classnode='TABLE' and m.code=upper(tablename)) as code from pg_tables where schemaname = 'public' and @CONVUNITTYPE = 'table' union all select upper(p.proname) as id, (select coalesce(upper(p.proname)||' - '||max(m.name),upper(p.proname)) from metaclass m, metaclassprops mp where m.classnode='ACTION' and m.id = mp.metaclassid and mp.propnode='procedure' and lower(mp.strvalue)=p.proname) as code from pg_proc p, pg_namespace s where p.pronamespace = s.oid and s.nspname='public' and @CONVUNITTYPE = 'procedure'

A.formula: select a.convid from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID
select n.conceptid from conv n, convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID and a.convid=n.id
select ''||a.position||'.'||@CODE from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID

A.name: Внешний ключ
A.caption: Найти индентификатор по значению внешнего ключа

A.name: Идентификатор
A.caption: Идентификатор
A.formula: select coalesce(max(numb)+1,1)::int from convloads where convid=@CONVID and cid=0
select c.conceptid from convloads l, conv c where l.id=@CONVLOADID and l.convid = c.id
select convid from convloads where id=@CONVLOADID

A.name: Порядок
A.caption: Порядок
A.formula: select a.position from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID
select lpad(@POSITION ::text,5,' ')||'.'||c.code||' ['||lpad(a.position ::text,2,' ')||'.'||a.convunit||']' from convacts a, conceptitems c where a.conceptitemid = c.id and a.id=@CONVACTID

A.name: Способ выполнения
A.caption: Способ выполнения
A.formula: select a.convaction from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID
select t.convid from convloads t, convloadacts a where a.id=@CONVLOADACTID and a.CONVLOADID = t.ID
select convloadid from convloadacts where id=@CONVLOADACTID
select convactid from convloadacts where id=@CONVLOADACTID

A.name: Порядок
A.caption: Порядок
A.formula: select p.position from convactparams p where p.id = @CONVACTPARAMID

A.name: Наименование
A.caption: Наименование
A.formula: select p.name from convactparams p where p.id = @CONVACTPARAMID

A.name: Ключ поиска записи
A.caption: Входит в ключ поиска записи
A.formula: select replace(replace(replace(replace(p.value_key::text,'{',''),'}',''),'f','Нет'),'t','Да') from convactparams p where p.id = @CONVACTPARAMID
select h.benefitsrecipientsid from benefit01 h where h.ID= @BENEFIT01ID ::bigint

GA.caption: Реквизиты справки ФСС об отсутствии регистрации
Реквизиты документа о совместном проживании ребенка

A.name: Ребенок
A.formula: select trim(COALESCE(lastname,'')||' '||COALESCE(firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(patronymic,'')) from CHILD d, BENEFITCHILD b where d.id = @CHILD01ID ::bigint and d.BENEFITCHILDID = b.id

GA.caption: Реквизиты справки ОГСЗН о признании безработными

A.name: Справка из ОГСЗН о признании безработными

GA.name: Справка о постановке на учет в ранние сроки беременности
GA.caption: Справка о постановке на учет в ранние сроки беременности

A.formula: select h.benefitsrecipientsid from benefit04 h where h.ID= @BENEFIT04ID ::bigint

A.formula: select trim(COALESCE(lastname,'')||' '||COALESCE(firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(patronymic,'')) from CHILD04 d, BENEFITCHILD b where d.id = @CHILD04ID ::bigint and d.BENEFITCHILDID = b.id
select h.benefitsrecipientsid from benefit05 h where h.ID= @BENEFIT05ID ::bigint

A.name: Ребенок
A.formula: select trim(COALESCE(lastname,'')||' '||COALESCE(firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(patronymic,'')) from CHILD05 d, BENEFITCHILD b where d.id = @CHILD05ID ::bigint and d.BENEFITCHILDID = b.id

GA.caption: Реквизиты справки из мед.организации о сроке беременности от 180 дней и более

A.formula: select h.benefitsrecipientsid from benefit07 h where h.ID= @BENEFIT07ID ::bigint

A.name: Вид
A.caption: Вид
A.formula: select d.name from benefitchild b, CERTIFICATEBIRTHDIR d where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID ::bigint and b.docbirthchildtypeid=d.id

A.name: Серия
A.caption: Серия
A.formula: select b.docbirthchildserial from benefitchild b where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID ::bigint

A.name: Номер
A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select b.docbirthchildnumber from benefitchild b where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID ::bigint

A.name: Дата выдачи
A.caption: Дата выдачи
A.formula: select b.docbirthchilddate from benefitchild b where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID ::bigint

A.name: Ребенок
A.formula: select trim(COALESCE(lastname,'')||' '||COALESCE(firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(patronymic,'')) from CHILD07 d, BENEFITCHILD b where d.id = @CHILD07ID ::bigint and d.BENEFITCHILDID = b.id
select BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID from MULTIPLEPAYMENTS where id = @MULTIPLEPAYMENTSID

A.name: Ребенок
A.formula: select trim(COALESCE(lastname,'')||' '||COALESCE(firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(patronymic,'')) from BENEFITCHILD b where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID
select BENEFITSRECIPIENTSID from UNLAWFULSURCHARGE where id = @UNLAWFULSURCHARGEID

A.name: Ребенок
A.formula: select trim(COALESCE(lastname,'')||' '||COALESCE(firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(patronymic,'')) from BENEFITCHILD b where b.id=@BENEFITCHILDID

A.name: Ссылка на реестр
A.formula: select case when sum(ssum) > 0 then 'true' else 'false' end from (select count(*) as ssum from benefit01 s where s.benefitsrecipientsid = @ID union select count(*) from benefit02 s where s.benefitsrecipientsid = @ID union select count(*) from benefit03 s where s.benefitsrecipientsid = @ID union select count(*) from benefit04 s where s.benefitsrecipientsid = @ID union select count(*) from benefit05 s where s.benefitsrecipientsid = @ID union select count(*) from benefit06 s where s.benefitsrecipientsid = @ID union select count(*) from benefit07 s where s.benefitsrecipientsid = @ID) ss

A.name: Должность
A.caption: Должность
A.formula: select b.postpers from companydir b where b.id= @COMPANYNAMEID ::bigint

A.name: Фамилия
A.caption: Фамилия
A.formula: select b.lastnamepers from companydir b where b.id= @COMPANYNAMEID ::bigint

A.name: Имя
A.caption: Имя
A.formula: select b.firstnamepers from companydir b where b.id= @COMPANYNAMEID ::bigint

A.name: Отчество
A.caption: Отчество
A.formula: select b.patronymicpers from companydir b where b.id= @COMPANYNAMEID ::bigint

A.name: Телефон
A.caption: Телефон
A.formula: select b.phonepers from companydir b where b.id= @COMPANYNAMEID ::bigint

A.name: email
A.caption: email
A.formula: select b.emailpers from companydir b where b.id= @COMPANYNAMEID ::bigint

A.name: Запрет загрузки, начиная c 11 числа до конца месяца
A.caption: Запрет загрузки, c 11 числа до конца месяца

A.name: Минимум
A.formula: select b.min from benefitsindexdirhistory b where b.BENEFITSINDEXDIRID = @ID ::bigint and b.PAYDATEFROM = (select max(b2.PAYDATEFROM) from benefitsindexdirhistory b2 where b2.BENEFITSINDEXDIRID = @ID ::bigint )

A.name: Максимум
A.formula: select b.max from benefitsindexdirhistory b where b.BENEFITSINDEXDIRID = @ID ::bigint and b.PAYDATEFROM = (select max(b2.PAYDATEFROM) from benefitsindexdirhistory b2 where b2.BENEFITSINDEXDIRID = @ID ::bigint )

A.name: 1-й ребенок
A.formula: select b.child1st from benefitsindexdirhistory b where b.BENEFITSINDEXDIRID = @ID ::bigint and b.PAYDATEFROM = (select max(b2.PAYDATEFROM) from benefitsindexdirhistory b2 where b2.BENEFITSINDEXDIRID = @ID ::bigint )

A.name: 2-й и...ребенок
A.formula: select b.child2ndsub from benefitsindexdirhistory b where b.BENEFITSINDEXDIRID = @ID ::bigint and b.PAYDATEFROM = (select max(b2.PAYDATEFROM) from benefitsindexdirhistory b2 where b2.BENEFITSINDEXDIRID = @ID ::bigint )

A.name: Актуально
A.formula: select coalesce((select true from benefitsindexdirhistory b where @PAYDATEFROM ::date = (select max(b2.PAYDATEFROM) from benefitsindexdirhistory b2 where b2.BENEFITSINDEXDIRID = @BENEFITSINDEXDIRID ::bigint) limit 1), false)

REPORT.name: Сводный отчет о назначении и выплате пособий
Сводный отчет по гражданам, имеющим детей
